item.title: Library App(Java)
item.description: A simple java application for saving and retrieving book information(ISBN, Title, Author). Array list was used as a data store for saving book objects.

item.title: Iot Fish Farm Monitoring
item.description: Fish farm water quality monitoring using the internet of things. This projects was build with Arduino micro-controller and nodeMCU wifi module.

item.title: Rock Scissors Paper (Java)
item.description: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock Game is an extended version of the classical Rock Paper Scissors game mentioned in the Season 2 of “Big Bang Theory” by Sheldon Cooper.

item.title: Basic Calculator
item.description: Analyzing the individual performances of the musical duo Psquare using their separate Youtube channels based on the total views on all their videos. Psquare is an African music group that is made up of Peter(Peter's channel is MrPVEVO) and Paul (Paul's Channel is RudeboyVEVO).

item.title: Web(youTube) Scrapping (Pyhton)
item.description: Analyzing the individual performances of the musical duo Psquare using their separate Youtube channels based on the total views on all their videos. Psquare is an African music group that is made up of Peter(Peter's channel is MrPVEVO) and Paul (Paul's Channel is RudeboyVEVO).
